alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 9:03PM CDT until March 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Accumulating snow. A dusting to half inch of additional accumulation possible before precipitation ends. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 12 AM MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow will end from west to east this evening. Locally hazardous travel conditions will persist well after precipitation ends, as lingering snow and slush on area roads turn to ice overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
